translations.translation: any backbiter, slandermonger,
Or backbiter, calumniator, slanderer,
the fault-finder who goes around slandering,
back-biting, gossiping,
The excessively insulting one, spreader of spite.
A Hammaz, going about with Namim,
Defamer, going about with slander
backbiter, going about with slander,
Detracter, spreader abroad of slanders,
or to any defamer or one who spreads slander,
A defamer, spreader abroad of slander.
scandal-monger, talebearer,
A slanderer, going about with calumnies,
A slanderer, going about with calumnies,
the backbiter who goes about slandering,
Backbiter, spreader of slander.
[And] scorner, going about with malicious gossip -
[68:11] backbiting, faultfinder, that is to say, calumniator, scandal-monger, spreading [evil] talk among people in order to sow dissension between them,
(Detractor) who slanders and curses people right and left, (spreader abroad of slanders) who is a talebearer in order to cause mischief between people?
{Hammāzin} means someone who is always causing trouble among people.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ هَمَّازٍ } عيَّاب طعَّان يغتاب ويطعن بعض الناس عند بعضهم { مَّشَّآءٍ } يدور بين الناس { بِنَمِيمٍ } [القلم: 11] أي: ينقل حديث بعض عن بعض
 حتى يوقع بينهم الفتنة والبغضاء

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ هَمَّازٍ } عيّابٍ طعَّان مغتاب { مشَّاء بنميم } نقّال للحديث من قوم إلى قوم
 على وجه السِّعاية والفساد بينهم
 فالنميم والنميمة: السعاية في إفساد ذات البيْن
